io.klerch.alexa.utterances.model

Class Intent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.klerch.alexa.utterances.model.Intent

  • public class Intent
extends Object
    JSON object representing an intent in the skill interaction model

      • getDuplicateSamplesWith

        public List<String> getDuplicateSamplesWith(Intent intent)
        Compares sample utterances of this intent with sample utterances with the intent given to this method. Returns the list of duplicate sample utterances contained in both intents
        Parameters:
        intent - intent whose sample utterances to compare with sample utterance of this intent
        Returns:
        list of duplicate sample utterances contained in both intents
